file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY2】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [LgyXzn0k0MA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Showcase of hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 official merchandise, including penlights, apparel, and limited collaboration items.
Event rules and safety precautions for attendees, covering mask requirements and behavior during the performance.
Continuation of hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 official items showcase, featuring trading cards, stationery, and stickers.

subtitles.original:
Attention ご来場の皆様へ
マスクの着用にご協力ください
subtitles.english:
Attention: To all attendees
Please cooperate by wearing a mask.

subtitles.original:
携帯電話はマナーモードに設定してください
撮影/録音/録画は禁止とさせていただきます
subtitles.english:
Set phones to silent mode.
Photography, recording, and filming are prohibited.

subtitles.original:
公演中に声を出しての応援はご遠慮ください
ライト・拍手で応援をお願いします
subtitles.english:
Please refrain from cheering out loud.
Please cheer using lights and clapping.

subtitles.original:
公演中は自席の前で立ってご鑑賞いただけます
公演中は席の移動をお控えください
subtitles.english:
You may stand at your seat to watch.
Please refrain from moving between seats.
